author: seamonkey82
content: Hey everyone.  It's been a little while since I've posted in this channel, because it seemed less noisy for me to report client errors more directly in their respective Discord channels.  Some client teams have a specific channel for merge or kiln while others don't.  At this point, I've shared some type of merge testing feedback with all client teams, so if any of it has gotten lost in the shuffle and/or there's a more preferred channel for me to post bug reports / logs / screenshots / etc. please ping me and let me know.  Also, while I think a quick screenshot and description might be sufficient in many situations, if it's helpful for me to create a GitHub issue for anything specific, let me know and I'd be happy to do so.

author: seamonkey82
content:
Here's a quick rundown of what appear to be the most critical flaws observed using the latest kiln/dev commits of all clients:
~~teku-nethermind: unable to sync to the head of the chain~~
nimbus-nethermind: unable to sync to the head of the chain
lighthouse-ethereumjs: In lighthouse `Syncing eth1 block cache` never proceeds beyond `initializing deposits`
lodestar-ethereumjs: lodestar tends to get out of sync leaving ethereumjs at `status=SYNCING` which never changes to `status=VALID` without a completely fresh sync
prysm (multiple EL clients): prysm often fails to re-establish communication with the EL client when the EL client is restarted (restarting prysm as well allows it to resume sync)
